info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 10 at 11:50PM EST until November 12 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne FL
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Cold Weather Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 24 expected. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation.
* WHERE...Inland Volusia, Northern Lake, and Southern Lake.
* WHEN...For the Cold Weather Advisory, until 9 AM EST Tuesday. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight Tuesday Night to 8 AM EST Wednesday.
* IMPACTS...Wind chill values less than 30 degrees can lead to hypothermia with prolonged exposure. Frost could harm sensitive outdoor vegetation. Sensitive outdoor plants may be killed if left uncovered.
info.instruction:
Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
Keep pets indoors as much as possible.
Make frequent checks on older family, friends, and neighbors. Ensure portable heaters are used correctly. Do not use generators or grills inside.
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

parameter.value: COLD WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST TUESDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TUESDAY NIGHT TO 8 AM EST WEDNESDAY

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
